title: Fake Subpage or Section for Locations in an Ontology Subsection or Single Profile

fields.label: General Title of Fake Subpage or Section for Locations
fields.name: location_fpage_title_general
fields.instructions: If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used. This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., title of fake subpage for locations in area of expertise subsection).

fields.label: General Intro Text of Fake Subpage or Section for Locations
fields.name: location_fpage_intro_general
fields.instructions: If you leave this blank, the default intro text structure will be used. This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., intro text of fake subpage for locations in area of expertise subsection).

fields.instructions: If you leave this blank, the default intro text structure will be used.
